title: Implement performance testing automation
description: Build automated performance testing system that measures response times, throughput, and resource utilization under various load conditions to ensure optimal system performance
iWant: automated performance testing with detailed metrics and benchmarking
soThat: I can validate performance targets and identify bottlenecks before production deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Performance tests execute automatically before each production deployment
Response time measurements are accurate within 10ms precision
Throughput testing validates system capacity under peak load conditions
Resource utilization metrics identify memory and CPU bottlenecks
